p: According to the results ( Table 1), temporal patterns of daily new confirmed cases were obtained in this study area (see Figure 3). Eleven areas showed significant temporal patterns during the study period, and four areas (i.e., Wuhan, Ezhou, Huanggang, and Zaoyang) with ITAC patterns, two areas (i.e., Yunmeng and Tianmen) with ITNO patterns, one area (i.e., Wuxue) with a DTAC pattern, and four areas (i.e., Shiyan, Shennongjia, Jingmen, and Tongcheng) with DTNO patterns.
